thread.title: Longhorns Daily News: Joel Klatt: ‘Texas looks like Alabama has looked and Georgia has looked’ - Burnt Orange Nation
thread.title_full: Longhorns Daily News: Joel Klatt: ‘Texas looks like Alabama has looked and Georgia has looked’ - Burnt Orange Nation

author: Xander Peters
title: Longhorns Daily News: Joel Klatt: ‘Texas looks like Alabama has looked and Georgia has looked’ - Burnt Orange Nation
text: Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt is on the [Texas Longhorns](https://www.burntorangenation.com) train. During a talking-head conversation earlier this week, Klatt gushed over Texas’ offense. In particular, Texas’ speed a wide receiver. Altogether, Klatt implies Texas is the real deal this season. “Texas looks like Alabama has looked and Georgia has looked,” Klatt explained, per [On3](https://www.on3.com/news/joel-klatt-believes-texas-longhorns-speed-will-cause-michigan-wolverines-problems/). “That’s what Sark is building. He left Alabama and he left the Nick Saban tree. That’s what he’s building from a roster. What I like about Sark has done is that he didn’t go try to copy Nick Saban from a personality standpoint or philosophy but he did look at that roster at Alabama and say, ‘Oh, yeah, that’s how you win. That’s how you win’. This looks like an early-2000s USC team. It looks like the Alabama teams and the Georgia teams.” WHAT THEY’RE SAYING ABOUT THE LONGHORNS [Austin American-Statesman](https://subscribe.statesman.com/restricted?return=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.statesman.com%2Fstory%2Fsports%2Fcolumns%2F2024%2F09%2F05%2Fgolden-longhorn-dusty-mangums-rose-bowl-kick-lives-on-20-years-later%2F75043194007%2F&gps-source=CPROADBLOCKDH&gca-cat=p&gca-uir=true&gca-epti=z119977p119977c119977u115150e002908v004150&sltsgmt=1001_B_20&gnt-eid=control):
